review: I received the Fire TV Stick as a gift and love it. Easy to use and navigate.Very happy with it.
author: Donna Mulhall

review: Highly recommend this for anyone wanting to get rid of cable tv
author: jeffarthur

review: It's okay.  Provides content as advertised although a majority of the better and more current movies are for a cost.  Netfllx is a better option and lower cost.  Prime plus Fire Stick is $135/yr. + movies; Netflix is about $120/yr.
author: RRonRob

review: Easy to set up, excellent streaming capability and selection!
author: Claire Morrissey

review: I would like more channels  player ,but I undestend its new .the quality of the movie it better the other media player very clear that I loved
author: Ana

review: It is not nearly as good as my Roku and unlike Netflix subscriptions many of the titles require additional fees.
author: John

review: Great product. I have a PS3 to access amazon video but my amazon music can not be played through the PS3. I plugged the fire stick into the receiver and WOW. Great music experience. Many other great things too.
author: William Sports

review: If you have Amazon Prime and an HDMI in, you will love this. Very easy to opperate.
author: Julie Carver
